attributes.additional_details:
There are many benefits to this plan. 
1)We will be see lower crime, as it has been shown most crimes occur when it is darker in the evening.
2)The economy benefits as we are able to have overlap with European countries' trading hours.
3)People will be able to enjoy activities in the evening for longer.
4)Heart attacks, strokes and car accidents would be reduced by putting the clocks back and forth.
attributes.background: Stop the clocks going back in autumn and keep BST throughout the year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612319
